Trade/Device Name(s): ImmunoCAP Allergen f439, Allergen component rCor a 14, Hazelnut, 14-5754-01
ImmunoCAP Allergen f440, Allergen component nCor a 9, Hazelnut, 14-5758-01
ImmunoCAP Allergen f441, Allergen component rJug r 1, Walnut, 14-5762-01
ImmunoCAP Allergen f442, Allergen component rJug r 3, LTP, Walnut, 14-5954-01
ImmunoCAP Allergen f443, Allergen component rAna o 3, Cashew nut, 14-5760-01
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Phadia ImmunoCAP Specific IgE assay and five new allergen components for automated quantitative measurement of allergen-specific IgE in serum or plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro quantitative assay for measurement of allergen specific IgE in human serum or plasma (EDTA or Na-Heparin), used as an aid in clinical diagnosis of IgE mediated allergic disorders in conjunction with other clinical findings in clinical laboratories.
